<![CDATA[
function matchwo(a,b)
{
if (a < b && a < 0) then
  {
  return 1;
  }
else
  {
  return 0;
  }
}
]]>
.
<![CDATA[
function matchwo(a,b)
{
if (a < b && a < 0) then
  {
  return 1;
  }
else
  {
  return 0;
  }
}
]]>
.

\<br/> not a tag

\* not a list

&lt;br/&gt; not a tag

`not code`
1. not a list
* not a list
# not a header

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
src line: 4321

.
** is not an empty emphasis
.
